original_text: But Samuel's sons did not live in a good way, as Samuel had done. They took money from people in ways that were not honest. They accepted bribes so that they did not judge in a fair way.
korean_text: 그의 아들들이 자기 아버지의 행위를 따르지 아니하고 이익을 따라 뇌물을 받고 판결을 굽게 하니라

sentences.original_text: But Samuel's sons did not live in a good way
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 사무엘의 아들들은 선한 방식으로 살지 않았고

sentences.original_text: in ways that were not honest
so that they did not judge in a fair way
